Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CylLS (a structural subunit of cytolysin; Bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the lantibiotic family (Class I bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: CylLL and CylLS are activated by an extracellular protease, CylA.

Literature.Title: Structural analysis and proteolytic activation of Enterococcus faecalis cytolysin, a novel lantibiotic.
Literature.Author: Booth MC, Bogie CP, Sahl HG, Siezen RJ, Hatter KL, Gilmore MS.
